page.title: 10Our visit to Court Farm
page.content: {Court Farm}was built in the 15th or 16th Century and there was a moat round it. The farm building lies behind{All Saints Church}and most fields are within easy reach. The owner keeps 500 sheep. He has 200 acres in{Longhope}and also rents land from other farmers. He grows{turnips, {hay}and uses large areas for{grazing} .The land is steep but he has good drainage and access. The owner uses the market in{Gloucester}to buy and sell. The farm is run by members of his family and the two sheep dogs are family pets.
